mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_cqjc WHERE collection LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{collection}), '%') OR insect LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{insect}), '%') OR insectNumber LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{insect_Number}), '%') OR density LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{density}), '%') OR OBservatory LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{O_bservatory}), '%') OR OBservationTime LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{O_bservation_time}), '%') OR photo LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{photo}), '%')
